Description:
Detects activity when the settings of the Windows firewall have been changed

Author: frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Windows Firewall Settings Have Been Changed
Query: sourcetype="windows-firewall-as" (eventid="2002" OR eventid="2083" OR eventid="2003" OR eventid="2082" OR eventid="2008")
